register.label-prompt: What should the date be called?
register.err: :x: "{creator}" already registered this for date "{date, date, ::yyyy-MM-dd}" :(

since.desc: Queries the time since/until a date
since.label-prompt: What is the label of the date?
since.time: {year, plural, =0 {} other {# years, }}{month, plural, =1 {# month} other {# months}}, {day, plural, =1 {# day} other {# days}}, {hour, plural, =1 {# hour} other {# hours}}, {minute, plural, =1 {# minute} other {# minutes}}, {second, plural, =1 {# second} other {# seconds}}

remove.label-prompt: What is the label of the date?

when.desc: Queries the exact date of a label
when.label-prompt: What is the label of the date?
